text: Ara tadera pascate amara pathiyechilama mariyama-putra isake, tamra purbe ta'orate ya chila tara pratipadakarupe, ara tamke amara diyechilama inajila yate rayeche pathapradarsana o dipti, era purbe ta'orate ya chila tara satya-samarthanarupe, ara pathapradarsana o upadesa dharmaparayanadera jan'ya.
